title: Embiid, George both out for game vs. Pistons
description: Philadelphia's duo will miss their season debut for the fourth straight game because of their nagging knee injuries.

title: Jurgensen named executive director of NBA Foundation
description: Jurgensen will be responsible for the strategic development, creation and implementation of the NBA Foundation’s efforts.

title: Jazz's Hendricks stretchered off with broken leg
description: Jazz forward Taylor Hendricks suffers a broken right fibula and dislocated ankle in the 3rd quarter of Monday's game in Dallas.

title: Banchero drops 50 on Pacers, ties Magic record in win
description: Tracy McGrady had set the franchise high-water mark for scoring in a half, which Paolo Banchero ties by shooting 13-for-17.

title: NBA League Pass Watch Guide: Week 2
description: 10 must-see games on NBA League Pass in Week 2 of the 2024-25 season.

title: Bucks look to bounce back tonight vs. Celtics
description: The Bucks are working to regain their footing and reassert themselves as contenders under coach Doc Rivers.

title: NBA Birthdays: Players born on Nov. 6
description: With over 5,000 players in NBA history, at least one player was born on every day of the calendar year.

title: NBA Fantasy: Week 2 Start/Sit
description: RotoWire highlights Start/Sit candidates for Week 2 of NBA Fantasy action.

title: Davis, Tatum named Players of the Week
description: The stars in Los Angeles and Boston take home the honors for Week 1.

title: Morehouse, Tuskegee to play in 2025 HBCU Classic
description: The SIAC matchup on Feb. 15, 2025 at Oakland Arena is part of NBA All-Star 2025 in the San Francisco Bay Area.

title: Power Rankings: Lakers, Cavs climb into Top 5
description: Cleveland and L.A. look sharp to open 2024-25, while Boston continues to lead the way this week.
